title: SRM Hackathon 9.0 Winner
subtitle: Won a 36-hour national hackathon, built a next-gen biometric engine automating multi-factor authentication and liveness detection.

title: DR.(MRS). SARAN BHATTACHARYA INNOVATION AWARD
subtitle: Honoured to receive the Dr. (Mrs.) Saran Bhattacharya Innovation Award for Secure Blink, a project focused on building secure, intelligent authentication through computer vision and AI.

title: Hackverse'24 Winnner
subtitle: Won a 24-hour national hackathon with an AI-powered accessibility assistant for visually impaired users.

title: MOZO HACK 6.0 Leaderboard
subtitle: Leveraging Retrieval-Augmented Generation to deliver verified medical diagnoses and medication advice in real-time. Smart tech for emergency response.

title: OODP Hack'23 Finalist
subtitle: Built a food delivery application by effectively applying core Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles such as encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism to design a modular and scalable system.
